item.description:
Kate - I lead this hike before and everybody really enjoyed themselves. It is a nice, easy 2 hour walk with different types of terrain. Single track trails as well as carriage trails. There is a beautiful pond that we hike around. The dogs really enjoy it there.


Luis - Sunday should be a great day. Let's enjoy a stroll in the woods. This is a lovely park, and our guide knows it like the back of her hands. Please let me know if the time is too early for folks...


Thank you all for your input. I will be sure to turn more of these ideas into events.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a green Chevy pickup and Kate drives a blue Jeep Cherokee.
item.name: Duxbury Forest, Duxbury, MA
